Description: Initial infrastructure build-out for large-scale data center operations. Major hardware installation and facility expansion phase.

AI_Event: GPT-4 Final Training & Bing AI Integration
Description: ABSOLUTE PEAK - Final training phase of GPT-4 (trillion+ parameters) combined with Microsoft Bing AI integration. Massive computational requirements for training runs.
Initial public release of GPT-4 to ChatGPT Plus subscribers. Massive inference workload as millions of users access the new model simultaneously.
Sustained high usage from widespread GPT-4 adoption across enterprise customers, API integrations, and growing ChatGPT user base.
Launch of multi-modal capabilities including vision (image analysis) and audio processing. Requires additional computational resources for processing multiple data types.
Massive growth in ChatGPT Plus subscriptions driving increased inference demand. More users accessing premium GPT-4 models.
Significant spike suggesting potential new model training or major infrastructure upgrade. Pattern consistent with previous major model releases.
